column4: what is a maintenance shell and how can i disable it on startup?
what is a maintenance shell and how can i disable it on startup?
tha one you get after booting?
it happens when I load ubuntu
what do you mean by "load ubuntu"?
well, you have a problem with an app
can you log into gnome after that?
it says "hit control D to cancel" or something and I can type things...not sure what else to do ha

yeah, I know... but it can be connected?
anyway, you are in the command line?
after that, you have to upgrade your system
